"'Gettin' the Band Back Together' doesn't belong on Broadway. Iâ€™m not being snobbish. The show simply isn't good enough...Its book does a piss-poor job of telling the story...And the humor is puerile...Despite its other failings, there is an audience for this show...Fans of 'Gettin' the Band Back Together' might be better served if the show were playing off-Broadway in a venue where ticket prices are cheaper and alcoholic beverages widely available to everyone in the room."
